description: This header file defines functions for creating messages related to thermostat events such as addition, removal, and update in a home automation system. It is part of a larger SDK for communicating thermostat state changes to a server.

methods.name: createThermostatAddedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message object indicating a thermostat has been added.

methods.name: createThermostatRemovedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message object indicating a thermostat has been removed.

methods.name: createThermostatUpdatedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message object indicating a thermostat has been updated.
